txt.en:
'A large pack of fell spirits the Algraig clans call Cun Annun have settled among the hills and valleys of the Lich Bluffs recently. These creatures are fearsome and are an indication of a darker power at work.  

'Can you seek out Cun Annun in this area and defeat any that you might find? They can be found roaming to the south and east of my camp.

'Be wary, [placeholder], for they are no ordinary hounds. The Cun Annun are demons of the ancient world.'
'Thank you for dispatching these insidious creatures. I fear that their arrival may give credence to tales of a darker force at work in the Lich Bluffs.'
'What evil summons forth wights and fell hounds must have great power indeed. We shall have to be cautious.'
A large pack of Cun Annun haunt the barrows of the Lich Bluffs, presenting a danger to those that would call Enedwaith home.
Cun Annun can be found in the southern reaches of the Lichbluffs. \n\nMincham has asked you to find and defeat as many Cun Annun as you are able.
Talk to Mincham in the Lich Bluffs
Mincham's camp is south and slightly east of the large Gondorian ruins in the Lich Bluffs.\n\nYou should return to Mincham and let him know that you have located and dispatched a pack of Cun Annun.
